title: Ticket #4727: Submit failures + retries + final node + rescue + recov = hung DAGMan
description:
Say you have a DAG like this: 

  Job Node1 foo.cmd
  Retry Node1 3
  Final NodeF bar.cmd

Now say you have the following sequence of events:

  1. submit the DAG and it runs
  2. all submit attempts for Node1 fail
  3. NodeF runs and succeeds
  4. fix the problem with Node1
  5. re-submit the DAG
  6. DAGMan goes into recovery mode
  7. DAGMan re-tries Node1 and it succeeds

Now DAGMan waits forever, even though it thinks all nodes are finished!: 

  Done     Pre   Queued    Post   Ready   Un-Ready   Failed
   ===     ===      ===     ===     ===        ===      ===
     2       0        0       0       0          0        0

I think the solution is to not allow a FINAL node to be marked as done in recovery mode.
